version_description:
- New Features (My Documents, My Events)
- Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Enhancements and bug fixes

Payment, journeys and performance enhancement
- You can now check and pay your bills and any other dues such as traffic fines, water and electricity and Mawaqif.
- You can also plan your services requests through a number of journeys such as Find a Job, Drive a Car and Get Social Support.
- We have made some performance enhancements and bug fixing.

Payment, journeys and performance enhancement
- You can now check and pay your bills and any other dues such as traffic fines, water and electricity and Mawaqif.
- You can also plan your services requests through a number of journeys such as Find a Job, Drive a Car and Get Social Support.
- We have made some performance enhancements and bug fixing.
Now you can log in to the app using either your Smart Pass account or UAE Pass account.

-Fixing issues and improving performance
-Now you can log in to the app using either your Smart Pass account or UAE Pass account.

• You can explore the application before Registration/Logging In. To know how it works, just download the application and continue as a guest.
• From the new Home Screen, view the popular services on Tamm.
• The in-app notifications would tell you the latest updates from your aspects of life.
• To maintain a consistence user experience, the application has gone through performance enhancements and minor fixes.

* Fixed a critical issue which could cause an application crash
* Performance fixes and build stabilization
Performance enhancements and user home screen updates.

• New revamped look and feel
• New home screen for quick access to documents, payments, services, and much more
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Users can now view their People of Determination card in App Dashboard
• Users can access their People of Determination card from My Documents listing
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

- No more getting signed out of your UAE Pass account. We've extended the UAE pass sessions for over 60 days.
- Dashboard sections can now be reordered to your personal preference, Allowing you to customize what's important to you.
- You can now reach your frequently used services easily by tagging them as favourites. Visit the services section to start creating your favourites list.
- Push notifications you receive can now send you directly to a particular document in the locker.
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements

Re-imagined Services Experience on TAMM!
- We’ve introduced a new native service card that's quick, intuitive and clearly displays cycle time & total costs
- Improvement in discoverability with new service categorization and tagging
- Improved search experience that gives more accurate suggestions and results
- Advanced filters that will help listing the services better with more focus
- Access the most popularly used services on TAMM, directly from the Home screen

Improved Guest Experience
- User will get notifications of the new features and capabilities that will be unlocked by logging in. This adds more context and drives the users to sign up through the UAE Pass or SmartPass.

Driving more favourable app store reviews
- Users can now rate TAMM apps on the app stores directly from the app, right after completing transactions
- Performance improvements and bug fixes

UAE PASS now supports account verification using face recognition!
- Follow the prompts from within the TAMM App to quickly get verified on UAE PASS without leaving your home
- Unlock the full potential of the TAMM App by getting your UAE PASS account verified today!

Revamped Support (Talk to Us) Experience on TAMM
- New Support (Talk to Us) interface that’s intuitive and easy to navigate
- New conversational case submission experience that guides you through support case submissions
- Improved support case tracking with new layouts and upgraded follow-up experience

Bug Fixes and performance improvements

Introducing Service Status Tracking

Go to ‘My Applications’ in your Locker to:
- View updates on the service application you have submitted on TAMM.
- Track the status of your ongoing service requests.
- Take actions on your requests directly from your Locker.

Note: This feature is available for a selected number of services that are on TAMM. We are constantly adding more trackable services.

Various bug fixes received for V 2.4.0
General performance improvements

Book a Virtual Appointment
- Instead of visiting TAMM Centres, now, you can get digital support in online sessions with Abu Dhabi Government agents.
- To start, choose My Support from My Locker, then tap on 'Book a Virtual Appointment.'

We have applied some fixes and performance improvements

Meet the New and Improved Homepage!
Introducing widgets on your TAMM App Home Screen. Simply add and remove content to customize your experience to your liking.
We’ve also enabled Quick Actions to help you get more done, quickly; right from the Home Screen

Also, MAWAQiF Parking Payment Feature
Now easily pay your public parking fees right from the TAMM app. Just select your car, the zone, and the duration. It’s just that simple.

Access My Support quickly from TAMM App bottom navigation
From My Support, raise a case to get Waste Management services
Now, Wallet is in the payments section which consolidate all your payment information in one place

• New and Improved AD Locker Experience: a rich Screen for AD Locker that shows highlights from your payments, documents, subscriptions, applications, and more
• Get access to your draft service applications so that you can pick it up from where you left
• Help us improve: submit your feedback and reviews using the new unified customer satisfaction survey
• We have applied some fixes and performance improvements
• We have applied some fixes and performance improvements

• Start a Chat with TAMM Virtual Assistant
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

Improved digital document experience within My Locker
• Revamped the document details view so that all the information is easy to find
• Download & share digital document images right from your Locker*
• Take quick actions on your documents, like renewing your driving licence
• Start related services, like replacing a lost car registration card; from the document detail view

*This feature is currently available for these documents: Tawtheeq, POD Card, Vehicle Registration, and Driving Licence
• We have applied some fixes and performance improvements
• We have applied some fixes and performance improvements

Enhanced Utility Bill Details
- We’ve introduced a complete breakdown of your ADDC/AADC bill usage!
- Track your Water and Electricity Consumption, define your usage pattern, and optimize your future bills
- Get historical records of your previous paid bills to track your payment history

Appointments
- Have an appointment with a government entity or a TAMM Center? you can now track these in your AD Locker!
- View your upcoming appointments with TAMM Service Centers.
- Know details about your appointment such as its location, time and how to reach there
• We have applied some fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
